content: व {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Powerful, strong. --वः {@--1@} Air, wind. {@--2@} The arm. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Varuṇa. {@--4@} Conciliation. {@--5@} Addressing. {@--6@} Auspiciousness. {@--7@} Residence, dwelling. {@--8@} The ocean. {@--9@} A tiger. {@--10@} Cloth. {@--11@} Reverence. {@--12@} <ab>N.</ab> of Rāhu. {@--13@} The residence of Varuṇa. {@--14@} The esculent root of the water-lily. --वं <ab>N.</ab> of Varuṇa (<ls>Medinī</ls>). {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} Like, as; as in मणी वोष्ट्रस्य लंबेते प्रियौ वत्सतरौ मम <ls>Sk.</ls>; (where the word may be व or वा).
